mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(discount,0) FROM yjd_neworder_discount WHERE #{currentTime} between begin_time and end_time AND discount_switch = 0 UNION SELECT 0 LIMIT 1
SELECT (amount-coupon_amount) FROM yjd_pay_outcome WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} and amount > 5
mapper.sql: SELECT loan_name,loan_money,loan_term,loan_sex, loan_location,job,monthly_income,wage_payment_form, company_monthly_income, personal_house, personal_car, order_time,order_no, personal_shebao, webank,is_native, house_assessment,car_assessment,status as ujdStatus FROM yjd_loan_info WHERE 1 = 1

and loan_money/10000 between #{beginMoney} and #{endMoney}
AND status between 0 and 1
AND status = 0
AND loan_location in
#{city}
and (
1 = 1
1 != 1
or (wage_payment_form between 4001 and 4002 AND work_year = 5003)
or (personal_shebao between 7003 and 7004 OR personal_gongjijin between 8003 and 8004)
or (job = 2003 AND register_time between 6002 and 6005)
or is_native = 2301
or personal_house between 1101 and 1104
or personal_car between 1401 and 1404
or webank not in("无","暂未填写")
or loan_chit = 1700
) ORDER BY order_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yjd_user_order ( user_id, order_no, order_price, order_time, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderNo}, #{price}, #{time}, now() );
mapper.select: SELECT ul.order_no, ul.loan_name, ul.loan_phone, ul.loan_money, ul.loan_term, ul.loan_age, ul.loan_oldcity, ul.loan_location, ul.loan_married, ul.job, ul.wage_payment_form, ul.monthly_income, ul.work_year, ul.personal_shebao, ul.personal_gongjijin, ul.personal_house, ul.house_address, ul.house_pledge, ul.personal_car, ul.car_address, ul.car_pledge, ul.loan_debt, ul.loan_chit, ul.credit_card_status, ul.order_no, ul.zmxy, ul.webank, ul.tags, ul.is_native, ul.company_type, ul.register_time, ul.company_monthly_income, ul.house_assessment, ul.car_assessment, ul.loan_phone_attribution, uo.order_time, uo.`status` FROM yjd_user_order uo left join yjd_loan_info ul on ul.order_no = uo.order_no where uo.user_id = #{userId} AND uo.order_no =#{orderNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE yjd_user_order SET order_success_amount = #{orderSuccesAmount}, order_success_term = #{orderSuccessTerm}, order_success_time = #{orderSuccessTime}, order_evaluate = #{orderEvaluate}, submit_time = now(), status = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND order_no =#{orderNo}
UPDATE yjd_user_order SET order_bad_cause = #{orderBadCause}, order_evaluate = #{orderEvaluate}, submit_time = now(), status = 2 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND order_no =#{orderNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yjd_order_refund ( user_id, mobile_number, loan_phone, order_no, order_price, reason, description, is_done, create_time ) VALUES (#{userId},#{mobileNumber},#{loanPhone},#{orderNo},#{orderPrice},#{reason},#{description},0,now());
